AnalyzeFace.document: 对请求图片进行五官定位。
AnalyzeFace.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iai.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AnalyzeFace
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "http://test.image.myqcloud.com/testA.jpg",
    "Mode": "0"
}
